overview: Kieron James has a proven track record within leading edge B2B, IT, retail and commercial market sectors. With strong leadership, strategic marketing and business development experience, he is results oriented with significant business infrastructure planning skills. Kieron has founded and developed several start-ups and held key positions in larger organisations. In 1997 he established Da Vinci Design and Publishing Ltd - a business which he successfully grew and sold - before accepting the position of Business Development Director at Domainnames.com. Kieron was promoted to Region Manager, Latin America at Domainnames.com in 2000 prior to the company’s acquisition by VeriSign Inc. He later returned to Europe where we took up the position of European Business Development Director for VeriSign and subsequently Managing Director for VeriSign in the UK, assuming overall operational and strategic control of the business. He founded Zimo Communications in February 2005, was appointed Chair of the FCS Numbering Group in 2006 and has represented the industry in many consultation meetings and in the preparation of documents for industry regulators Ofcom and PhonepayPlus.
